title: Ben Affleck dons a heavy blue peacoat and matching navy slacks for a solo stroll in Brentwood
text:
Ben Affleck is back in blue, taking a stroll on his own in Brentwood, California on Tuesday afternoon.

The 47-year-old actor was seen bundled up in a fall-friendly ensemble as he headed out on his own.

The Justice League star was not seen with his new flame, Katie Cherry, during his afternoon outing.

Back in blue: Ben Affleck is back in blue, taking a stroll on his own in Brentwood on Tuesday afternoon

Affleck hit the streets of Brentwood wearing a dark blue dress shirt with a matching peacoat for his stroll.

He also wore dark blue jeans with brown boots while rocking his traditional salt and pepper beard.

His latest outing comes just days after his latest sobriety relapse following a Halloween party in Hollywood.

Brentwood stroll: Affleck hit the streets of Brentwood wearing a cobalt blue dress shirt with a matching peacoat for his stroll

Affleck was spotted leaving a Halloween masquerade ball for charity on Saturday night, with his new fling, musician Katie Cherry.

The Batman vs. Superman: Dawn of Justice star was wearing a skull mask that disguised his face, waiting for Cherry to call a rideshare vehicle.

The actor was seen stumbling backwards, grabbing on to another vehicle to balance himself, before getting into the car with Cherry.

Relapse: Affleck was spotted leaving a Halloween masquerade ball for charity on Saturday night, with his new fling, musician Katie Cherry

Affleck was seen later that night at the Commerce Casino, playing some poker with Cherry at his side at 1 a.m.

TMZ reported that Affleck sat down at a table with $20,000, and walked away with $1,500 in winnings after just 12 minutes at the table.

On Sunday, while spotted arriving at his ex-wife Jennifer Garner's house, he acknowledged his sobriety slip-up.

Poker Ben: Affleck was seen later that night at the Commerce Casino, playing some poker with Cherry at his side at 1 a.m.

'Well you know it happens, it’s a slip but I’m not going to let it derail me,' Affleck said before arriving at Garner's house in Pasadena, in video obtained by Daily Mail.

When asked if he was heading back to rehab, Affleck wouldn't answer as he headed to his ex's home.

Affleck will next be seen in The Way Back, reuniting with The Accountant director Gavin O'Connor, which hits theaters March 6, 2020.
description: Ben Affleck is back in black, taking a stroll on his own in Brentwood on Tuesday afternoon.
